SELECT T.* FROM (SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS RNUM, a.* FROM ( SELECT INGEST_SEQ , UPLOAD_TYPE , (SELECT CONTENT FROM tb_cmmn_code_sub WHERE CMMN_CODE1 = 'UPLOAD_TYPE' AND CMMN_CODE2 = UPLOAD_TYPE) AS UPLOAD_TYPE_TXT , CONTENT_TYPE , (SELECT CONTENT FROM tb_cmmn_code_sub WHERE CMMN_CODE1 = 'CONTENT_TYPE' AND CMMN_CODE2 = CONTENT_TYPE) AS CONTENT_TYPE_TXT , CONTENT_TITLE , CONTENT_FILENAME , CONTENT_URL , CAST(INGET_DATETIME AS CHAR) AS INGET_DATETIME FROM tb_content_recv_log WHERE 1=1
AND INGEST_SEQ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ingestSeq}, '%')
AND UPLOAD_TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{uploadType}, '%')
AND CONTENT_TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{contentType}, '%')
AND CONTENT_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{contentTitle}, '%')
AND INGET_DATETIME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ingetDatetime}, '%')
ORDER BY INGEST_SEQ ASC ) a, ( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) b ) T ORDER BY INGEST_SEQ DESC LIMIT #{searchVO.recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{searchVO.firstIndex}

AND INGEST_SEQ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ingestSeq}, '%')
